title: Vehicular Pursuit Policies (St. Louis Metropolitan Police Department)

communications.subject: The Missouri Sunshine Law Request: Vehicular Pursuit Policies (St. Louis Metropolitan Police Department)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the The Missouri Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

All current policies maintained by the department regarding vehicle pursuits (also known as: car chase, vehicular response policy, vehicular pursuit procedure).

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Sydnee Coggins-Prioleau

communications.subject: [Records Center] Welcome to the Records Center!
communications.communication:
Dear Sydnee Coggins-Prioleau, 
 
Thank you for submitting a public records request to the City of St. Louis OR the St. Louis Metropolitan Police Department. 
 
If you did not submit your request through a Public Records Portal, an account has been created for you and you can now track the progress of this request, communicate directly with staff and receive most open records electronically. 
 
Please note, you can use the same Log-in for the City of St. Louis Public Records Portal OR the (https://u8387778.ct.sendgrid.net/ls/click?upn=6HtRfOYLt5fXvpttM-2FU1HTlIccejzKd5Zy5e17XkUYReoC4lkjH7N3tXeckovooOjj0VOMfykmcmcgV2k3SuZKU0Etu6mmdGvJDTiPvjGDk-3D570g_AQwG9wmo2Gs-2BO9FzfPDbew6v6AqL2NlKYHjvM4ZyEwRMvXF9U7TkKJLjQeVil1gErFvGwz8-2Ba4F9YSBYlihoo78yeI7jZibO9wfAUZTM56O1mJHL8BTJ4FDZ6FRzvfp2NyevQSd6fU4SxlN2DyzTo90-2F36khp8JHN10ambooARrI1HmaTcfh0zIuSo-2BxTHfH9dEA4W328lVG-2FhD2FiiBMXg5hijGzQ1way1Q1j-2B-2Bj0g-3D) SLMPD Public Records Portal. (https://u8387778.ct.sendgrid.net/ls/click?upn=6HtRfOYLt5fXvpttM-2FU1HXKlOqhFxFGl1qpcWGCRpN2p6FkZS8KJuLPxrqfVx7pC4ifcQUDRHAPLXCZCw6mBPVjOLA5bgFu4l81vSD9DE28-3DLmhR_AQwG9wmo2Gs-2BO9FzfPDbew6v6AqL2NlKYHjvM4ZyEwRMvXF9U7TkKJLjQeVil1gErFvGwz8-2Ba4F9YSBYlihoo-2FO8oaVKkyzki2uM6w79rUd693-2FlTGgFegekSzyQz63SDvilq-2BhQIlbOGSpmd0HeccNVQbQwn6YZl-2FJOz8xda6lCsVoL1b90voAtDQXesVRy10S7-2BcRi-2BLSBgA7yRl2wyu7g0Aic6yArC-2FWAlWv7Bms-3D) 
 
 Your Login ID is:  149275-96003493@requests.muckrock.com 
 
If you have never used this system or cannot remember your password you may request a temporary password here: Request Temporary Password (https://u8387778.ct.sendgrid.net/ls/click?upn=6HtRfOYLt5fXvpttM-2FU1HUV8yXyCwIyA2ujI90R-2Fti72wu0AntPMCL0xU0-2FKwKTDzK4JKBQ8onVU8qAaEtUza5I-2FlOu4bv5ItknemgX1woA-3DZmv5_AQwG9wmo2Gs-2BO9FzfPDbew6v6AqL2NlKYHjvM4ZyEwRMvXF9U7TkKJLjQeVil1gErFvGwz8-2Ba4F9YSBYlihoo83gii5yeMEd8XydE3Oir-2FzvN8Me45iTbaFBvk3Srq2JNS5rmpkw7QcSe-2FLg1qNPk7mP0zL-2B9DrsjcW4WJdJm3Ki25AuSIUu8mjx0hwEO38rZBYjJzcYL7U5HAjNK0D7F218spt-2B8wdEu0e4xVVWD18-3D) 
 
Once your email address has been verified, log-in to the appropriate portal and go to My Records Center to update your account information, track this request and receive your records once they are available. 
 
 
Thank you!

communications.subject: SLMPD - Public Records Request :: P021902-071723
communications.communication:
Dear Sydnee Coggins-Prioleau: 
Thank you for submitting a records request to the St. Louis Metropolitan Police Department.  Your request was given reference number P021902-071723, for tracking purposes. Type of Records Selected: Other Police Record Complaint Number (if applicable): Type of Incident (if applicable): Description of Request (if applicable):   To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the The Missouri Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

All current policies maintained by the department regarding vehicle pursuits (also known as: car chase, vehicular response policy, vehicular pursuit procedure).

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Sydnee Coggins-Prioleau

Upload documents directly: https://accounts.muckrock.com/accounts/login/?next=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.muckrock.com%2Faccounts%2Flogin%2F%3Fnext%3D%252Faccounts%252Fagency_login%252Fst-louis-metropolitan-police-department-671%252Fvehicular-pursuit-policies-st-louis-metropolitan-police-department-149275%252F%253F&url_auth_token=AAAj9WsQ4FuNTZD2Y9DnVAucV28%3A1qLLx5%3AaHhFL1dAl0J3DlmmJxaXiAXZngGS5wNKxpcYfEkLRNU 
We are currently reviewing your request and will contact you if any additional information is required.  Otherwise, we will proceed with locating and gathering responsive records from various departments.  Once records are located, they will need to be reviewed to determine what may be released at this time.  All records are released in accordance with the Missouri Sunshine Law, Chapter 610 and SLMPD Policy. 
There will be a cost associated with this request, and you will be contacted with more details prior to records being released.  The earliest records are typically available is as follows: 
• Arrest Reports, Background Checks, Crash Reports, Police Calls for Service, Law Enforcement Requests and Non-criminal Police Reports are available within 10 days of submission of your request. 
• Criminal Police Reports, evidentiary material and other non-standard requests are available within 30 days of submission. 
In the event your request will require additional time you will be provided with a detailed explanation of any further delay. 
 
You can monitor the progress of your request at the link below and you'll receive an email when your request has been completed. 
 
Thank you!

communications.subject: [Records Center] SLMPD - Public Records Request :: P021902-071723
communications.communication:
--- Please respond above this line --- 

RE: Public Records Request submitted on July 17, 2023, Reference # P021902-071723 

Dear Sydnee Coggins-Prioleau, 

Responsive records to the above-referenced request have been released and are now available to you through the Public Records portal.  Redactions, if any, have been noted within the responsive record.  Fees have been waived. 

This request is now closed. 

Thank you, 

Erika Zaza 
Sunshine Law 
(314) 444-5388

communications.subject: Public Records Request :: R016631-071423
communications.communication:
Dear Sydnee Coggins-Prioleau: 
Thank you for your interest in public records of St. Johns County Sheriff's Office. Your request has been received and is being processed in accordance with Chapter 119 of the Florida State Statues.  Your request was received in this office on 7/14/2023 and given the reference number R016631-071423 for tracking purposes. Records Requested: St. Johns County Sheriff's Office
SL Office
4015 Lewis Speedway
St. Augustine, FL 32084
July 14, 2023
To Whom It May Concern:
Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:
All current policies maintained by the department regarding vehicle pursuits (also known as: car chase, vehicular response policy, vehicular pursuit procedure).
The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.
In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.
Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.
Sincerely,
Sydnee Coggins-Prioleau
View request history, upload responsive documents, and report problems here:
https://accounts.muckrock.com/accounts/login/?next=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.muckrock.com%2Faccounts%2Flogin%2F%3Fnext%3D%252Faccounts%252Fagency_login%252Fst-johns-county-sheriffs-office-15860%252Fvehicular-pursuit-policies-st-johns-county-sheriffs-office-149240%252F%253Femail%253Djpriester%252540sjso.org&url_auth_token=AABKKjc881XQmgFE0KfUOsffg_w%3A1qKHQP%3Ae7d9DDJQ6yn06ooGE7SXZkfwQPbiHcjajLEYkCfLIzU
If prompted for a passcode, please enter:
WUWCPEUW
Filed via MuckRock.com
E-mail (Preferred): 149240-06559465@requests.muckrock.com
PLEASE NOTE OUR NEW ADDRESS
For mailed responses, please address (see note):
MuckRock News
DEPT MR 149240
263 Huntington Ave
Boston, MA 02115 
Your request will be forwarded to the relevant department(s) to locate the information you seek and to determine the volume and any costs associated with satisfying your request. You will be contacted about the availability and/or provided with copies of the records in question. PLEASE NOTE: The Chapter 119 of the Florida State Statues does not require a governmental body to create new information, to do legal research, or to answer questions. 
You can monitor the progress of your request at the link below and you'll receive an email when your request has been completed. Again, thank you for using the Records Request Center. St. Johns County Sheriff's Office

communications.subject: RE: The Missouri Sunshine Law Request: Vehicular Pursuit Policies (Franklin County Sheriff's Office)
communications.communication:
This email is to acknowledge receipt of your request for records pertaining to vehicular pursuit policies.  Requests are processed in the order in which they are received.  Please be advised  our request volume is currently very high.  It could be a week or more before your request can be fully processed.  We will notify you as this status changes.  Thank you in advance for your patience.

Thanks and have a wonderful day,

Kim Moritz
Records Clerk – Front Desk
Franklin County Sheriff’s Office
#1 Bruns Lane  Union, MO 63084
Phone:  (636) 583-2560
Fax:  (636) 584-6877
